DOC.brief_summary: The paucity publish data concern issue mechanical labor induction set Term PROM lead u undertake present clinical trial . This study design compare efficacy safety standard Oxytocin induction protocol double-balloon catheter device concurrent oxytocin administration patient Term PROM unfavorable cervical condition .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomise trial . Two hundred pregnant woman term PROM unfavourable cervix ( Bishop Score â‰¤ 4 ) expect enter study ( see statistical analysis ) . All eligible woman present study protocol study coordinator . Women interested participate read sign inform consent . Subsequently , follow screen medical procedure complete : medical gynecological history , physical vaginal examination , ultrasonography : ( ) Confirm fetal vertex presentation , ( ii ) Exclude placenta previa ( iii ) Assess cervical length posterior cervical angle . ( iv ) Asses bio-physical profile score A non-stress test perform order monitor : 1 . The fetal heart pattern presence absence deceleration 2 . The presence uterine contraction . All woman undergo pelvic examination staff member obtain initial Bishop score . If patient determine eligible study entry , follow informed consent , randomisation follow group take place : GROUP 1 : Oxytocin infusion alone ( Standard Protocol ) . GROUP 2 : insertion double balloon device concurrent oxytocin administration . GROUP 3 : Expectant management
